page.title: 07LOCAL PIPE BAND
page.content: Our local pipe band is The Strathearn, which consists of local people who have been in competetive class for 50 years and are still in grade 4.There is 6 grades in Pipe Band competitions starting with Novice Juvenile,Juvenile Grade 4, Grade 3, Grade 2,Grade 1.They have been lucky in one or two contests.Their band has got a new Pipe Major recently, and are hopeful of a better competition record. There are eight pipers in The Strathearn Pipe band and there are four side drummers.They practise in Crieff Primary School on Wednesday nights.The Pipe Major is called Andy Renwick who is also a member of The Vale of Atholl Pipe Band.They compete in lots of competitions in one year.
